featuredTrack.title: Pretty Damaged
featuredTrack.description: Scars are just stories written on skin. Damage can be beautiful.

dailyQuote.text: We sample the world because the world is already music.
dailyQuote.author: Finnian Frost

news.title: Featured Track: Pretty Damaged
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'Pretty Damaged' - track 06 from our album. Scars are just stories written on skin. Damage can be beautiful.

news.title: Featured Track: Victorious Failure
news.content: Exploring the sonic landscape of 'Victorious Failure' today. Triumphant, Dark, Resilient energy throughout.

news.title: Featured Track: No Geography
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'No Geography' - track 09 from our album. Borderless sound. Music that exists everywhere and nowhere.

news.title: Featured Track: Gut Feeling
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'Gut Feeling' - track 10 from our album. Trust the instinct. When your body knows before your mind does.

news.title: Featured Track: After the Wreckage (we dance)
news.content: 'After the Wreckage (we dance)' is taking center stage. The title track spirit. Finding joy in the aftermath. Movement through destruction.

news.title: Featured Track: Analog Vertigo (The Lullaby)
news.content: Diving deep into 'Analog Vertigo (The Lullaby)' today. This track embodies warm, disorienting, nostalgic.

news.title: Featured Track: Glitch Choir
news.content: Diving deep into 'Glitch Choir' today. This track embodies vocal, fragmented, sacred.

news.title: Featured Track: Found Sounds
news.content: Today we're highlighting 'Found Sounds' - track 12 from our album. The closer. Discovering music in unexpected places. Every ending is a beginning.
